articles.title: ‘Heartstopper’ Adds Jonathan Bailey, Hayley Atwell and Eddie Marsan to Season 3 Cast - Variety
articles.description: Jonathan Bailey, Hayley Atwell and Eddie Marsan have joined the cast of 'Heartstopper' Season 3.
articles.content:
Jonathan Bailey, Hayley Atwell and Eddie Marsan have joined the cast of “Heartstopper” Season 3.
Atwell (“Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One,” “Captain America: The First Avenger”) will p… [+1747 chars]
